asian_regional_organizations.name: Asia Cooperation Dialogue
asian_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote Asian cooperation at a continental level and integrate separate regional organizations.

asian_regional_organizations.name: Asian Development Bank
asian_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote social and economic development in Asia.

asian_regional_organizations.name: Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation
asian_regional_organizations.purpose: To foster economic growth and prosperity in the Asia-Pacific region.

asian_regional_organizations.name: East Asia Summit
asian_regional_organizations.members: 18 countries, including ASEAN member states, Australia, China, India, Japan, New Zealand, Russia, South Korea, and the United States
asian_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote strategic dialogue and cooperation on political, security, and economic issues of common regional concern.

asian_regional_organizations.name: Association of Southeast Asian Nations
asian_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote intergovernmental cooperation and facilitates economic, political, security, military, educational, and sociocultural integration among its members and other Asian states.

asian_regional_organizations.name: Bay of Bengal Initiative for Multi-Sectoral Technical and Economic Cooperation
asian_regional_organizations.purpose: To create an enabling environment for rapid economic development through identification and implementation of specific cooperation projects.

asian_regional_organizations.name: International Network for Bamboo and Rattan
asian_regional_organizations.purpose: To improve the social, economic, and environmental benefits of bamboo and rattan.

asian_regional_organizations.name: Mekongâ€“Ganga Cooperation
asian_regional_organizations.purpose: To facilitate closer ties between the Ganga and Mekong river regions in areas such as tourism, education, and transportation.

asian_regional_organizations.name: Mekong River Commission
asian_regional_organizations.purpose: To manage the Mekong River's resources and promote sustainable development.

asian_regional_organizations.name: Partnerships in Environmental Management for the Seas of East Asia
asian_regional_organizations.purpose: To foster and sustain healthy and resilient oceans, coasts, communities and economies across the Seas of East Asia.

asian_regional_organizations.name: South Asian Association for Regional Cooperation
asian_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote economic and regional integration.

asian_regional_organizations.name: Southeast Asian Ministers of Education Organization
asian_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote cooperation in education, science and culture in the Southeast Asian region.

asian_regional_organizations.name: Trilateral Cooperation Secretariat
asian_regional_organizations.purpose: To promote peace and common prosperity among the three countries.

asian_regional_organizations.name: Gulf Cooperation Council
asian_regional_organizations.purpose: To achieve unity among its members based on their common objectives and their similar political and cultural identities.
